### Technical Description

The National Research Council (NRC) is seeking proposals from experienced vendors for the project of digitalizing National Construction Codes and implementing a National Common Data Framework. The overall objective is to enhance productivity in the construction sector.

The project entails the following foundational elements:

1.  Digitalization of National Model Construction Codes into a machine-readable format compatible with Building Information Modelling (BIM).
2.  Creation of a standardized national Common Data Framework, including data standards and exchange mechanisms to support a future national Common Data Environment.

### Business Requirements

*   The digitalized National Construction Codes
*   The National Common Data Framework
